name: PewPew Space Shooter
description:
This game is a school project for Computer Animation classes by Edit Muzhaqi. According to the assignment, the following changes have been made:

-The game design has changed, including the background and borders for the gameplay. 

-The menu has changed using another background template and works according to the game changes.

-The first level has been modified to include the enemy spawners with different speeds and attacks.

-The second level includes a new (final) boss with a new design, more life points and harder attacks. 

-The sound effects have been changed and the final boss has one of his own too.
